titleStmt.title: A godly newe short treatyse instructyng euery parson, howe they shulde trade theyr lyues in ye imytacyon of vertu, and ye shewyng of vyce [et] declaryng also what benefyte man hath receaued by christ, through theiffusyon of hys most precyous blowde.
titleStmt.author: Hart, Henry, fl. 1549.

publicationStmt.publisher: By me Robert Stoughton. Dwelling within Ludgate, at the sygne of the Byshhoppes Myter,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
